snippet: Paula Wagner, who went from actress to agent to Hollywood studio chief, has come to Broadway as a producer.
abstract: Paula Wagner, who started off acting on Broadway before moving to Hollywood where she became an agent, then a film producer, then chief executive at United Artists, has returned to New York as producer of the Broadway productions Grace and the Heiress.
lead_paragraph: Paula Wagner, who went from actress to agent to Hollywood studio chief, has come to Broadway as a producer.

headline.seo: Paula Wagner Turns to Producing on Broadway
headline.main: Hollywood Player Joins the Club on Broadway
headline.print_headline: Hollywood Player Joins the Club On Broadway
